Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What I can tell you is, you're the Dreamwalker, the only one who can come and go in Somnoire as you please.

Dialogues.Speaker: Strange White Cat
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You've got control over me, this gateway, and that sneaky black cat.

Dialogues.Speaker: Strange White Cat
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Basically, you're the only one who can see this gateway and all the anomalies it causes...

Dialogues.Speaker: Strange White Cat
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This is what happens when Somnoire expands into reality.

Dialogues.Speaker: Strange White Cat
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The black cat turned off Somnoire's filters, so it started copying every dream in Solaris.

Dialogues.Speaker: Strange White Cat
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: To store all those dreams, he opened more gateways that started to leech into reality.

Dialogues.Speaker: Strange White Cat
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The dreams you just went through are from folks who got stuck in Somnoire by accident.

Dialogues.Speaker: Strange White Cat
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But since you control these gateways, you can help them escape.

Dialogues.Speaker: Strange White Cat
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: When they wake up, all they'll have is a vague feeling of what happened.

Dialogues.Speaker: Strange White Cat
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Just like a real dream, mmm?

Dialogues.Speaker: Strange White Cat
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I can finally go back through the gateway I came from, and you... It's time for you to wake up, meow.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Back on the train, the white cat reveals why you are the only one that can help those trapped in dreams—you hold the highest control over the Somnoire. It also informs you that those you rescue will forget everything that happened in the Somnoire once they wake up.

Dialogues.Speaker: Strange White Cat
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Anything else you want to know?

Dialogues.Speaker: Strange White Cat
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Of course, silly! You didn't think that was all, did you?

Dialogues.Speaker: Strange White Cat
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The black cat might be nursing his boo-boos now, but he's not out of the game yet.

Dialogues.Speaker: Strange White Cat
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll find you if I need help, Dreamwalker.

Dialogues.Speaker: Strange White Cat
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Seriously..?

Dialogues.Speaker: Strange White Cat
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmm... fine...

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (You stroke the white cat.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Strange White Cat
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Meow... That's... purrfection.

Dialogues.Speaker: Strange White Cat
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ahem! Enough! No more petting.

Dialogues.Speaker: Strange White Cat
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Alright then. See you next time, Dreamwalker!

Dialogues.Speaker: Lumi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If this is a dream, then what happened here isn't real...

Dialogues.Speaker: Lumi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Maybe a bit, but you know what? My team always has my back, dream or not.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lumi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Even in a dream, the friendship felt so real.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lumi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you, {PlayerName}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lumi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh yeah, I've already met you in real life!

Dialogues.Speaker: Lumi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It was your support that kept me going.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lumi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So come find me in reality! I'll be waitin' for you!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh. Thought you'd already left.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The crisis is over. Why are you still hanging around?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Outside, more dirt's getting swept under the rug.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm ready to get back. But there is still one thing that's nagging at me...

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You. When I screwed up, you... had my back.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But hey, dream talk. Who's to say what's real. Not like I screw up in real life.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Heh, is that right? Prove it to me in the real world, then.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This is the end of our adventure!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: In this story, the ten warriors defeated the Black Cat Demon!

Options.PlotLineKey: But there were only six of us.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Not true! Cosmos, Cloudy, and the white cat were also part of our team...

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Of course they count! We are all brave warriors!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And the Grape Kingdom is where the next adventure begins...

Options.PlotLineKey: Make sure to tell me this story when you wake up.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No problem!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Maybe the white cat can be the bad guy next time...

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thanks for your help, {PlayerName}...

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I couldn't have finished that draft without you.

Options.PlotLineKey: You finished that same painting in reality.

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I still find myself swayed by my doubts.

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Painting, for me, isn't just in the finished piece. It's the only place I can let my emotions out.

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: When I worked on that Xiehua Village piece, I felt like I was capturing the very essence of life around me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thanks to you, I felt bold enough to capture those fleeting moments.

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I really need to be truer to myself...

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hey, could you visit me when you wake up? I want to show you my painting.

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Okay...

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll be waiting for you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Mmm, what do you think a dream is?

Options.PlotLineKey: It's a reflection of the past.
It's a glimpse into the future.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I realized this was a dream through careful observation. It's often that same keen observation that reveals the deepest truths.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Have you ever considered how someone with lost memories might confuse a dream with reality?

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Perhaps paying closer attention to your surroundings could bring you closer to understanding the true nature of "reality."

Options.PlotLineKey: What are you hinting at? Solaris is a figment of my imagination?

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's just a theory. I could be mistaken...

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But when I found myself in Hongzhen in my dream, my mind was a blank slate.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I knew where I was, but I had no idea why and for what purpose.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I suspect you experienced something similar upon awakening in the Gorges of Spirits.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes... I would advise you to pay close attention to the subtleties around you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If you've learned something from this dream, then it wasn't for nothing.

Dialogues.Speaker: Camellya
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Are you going to leave me? Again?

Dialogues.Speaker: Camellya
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But I'm actually quite content here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Camellya
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This is our arena! Look at all this, so much room for the chase...

Dialogues.Speaker: Camellya
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Then why not stay a bit longer?

Dialogues.Speaker: Camellya
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's not all that different from reality, if you really think about it.

Options.PlotLineKey: There's still a lot to do in reality.
A gateway will restore of all this back to reality.

Dialogues.Speaker: Camellya
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, what a shame.

Dialogues.Speaker: Camellya
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But waking up isn't so terrible. After all, you never fail to keep things interesting in reality.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmm? What's that over there next to the train?

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "Delivered by Fulei"... This is the lost package. How did I not notice it before...

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I should give it to Lumi.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You pick up the abandoned package.

Chapters.Title: Deliver the package to Lollo Logistics

Dialogues.Speaker: Cultured Exile
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's already been three days and my package is still—

Dialogues.Speaker: Lumi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm terribly sorry, but could you please...

Dialogues.Speaker: Lumi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, oh my!

Dialogues.Speaker: Lumi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This is your package, sir!

Dialogues.Speaker: Cultured Exile
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Huh? Let me check... Wait! Look at this, it's damaged!

Dialogues.Speaker: Cultured Exile
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don't expect me to accept a damaged package! This is unacceptable!

Dialogues.Speaker: Lumi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This is our fault... Please accept my sincere apologies. We will compensate you for your loss.

Dialogues.Speaker: Cultured Exile
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I don't want your compensation! I want my package! In one piece!

Dialogues.Speaker: Cultured Exile
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Do you have any idea how important this—

Dialogues.Speaker: Tianhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ah, the Rover {Male=himself;Female=herself}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Cultured Exile
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: B-boss? Why are you here in person? I'm just...

Dialogues.Speaker: Tianhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Silence.

Dialogues.Speaker: Tianhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No need for compensation. The contents are still intact. We'll pay you the delivery fee.

Dialogues.Speaker: Tianhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Did you retrieve this package yourself from the Waving Battlefield?

Dialogues.Speaker: Tianhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm Tianhu, leader of the Cruising Drake.

Dialogues.Speaker: Tianhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The package is secure, and we won't give you any more hassle. In fact, I wouldn't mind getting to know you better.

Dialogues.Speaker: Tianhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Not in that way, of course. I heard you took down that beast at Norfall Barrens. The wilds have been quieter since then, which means more opportunities for folks like us.

Dialogues.Speaker: Tianhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We're in need of skilled individuals like yourself more than ever. You'd fit right in.

Dialogues.Speaker: Tianhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Think about joining us one day. The Cruising Drake always welcomes the best of the best.

Dialogues.Speaker: Cultured Exile
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hey, wait up, Boss! Why do you always have to walk off like that after talking...

Dialogues.Speaker: Tianhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Shut it! It's about showing our style and drawing in new blood. Pipe down...

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You return to Lollo Logistics with the package, only to find the Exiles furious about its damage and ready to pick a fight. Just then, Tianhu, the leader of the Cruising Drake, arrives and swiftly calms his subordinates. He then extends a genuine invitation for you to join his gang.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lumi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So... it's done?

Options.PlotLineKey: They asked me to join their gang.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lumi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Huh... Well, thank you so, so, so much for helping me find the lost package!

Dialogues.Speaker: Lumi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ah? Why the sudden silence?

Options.PlotLineKey: I saw something strange in the Waving Battlefield.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lumi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh no, what is it?

Dialogues.Speaker: Lumi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Heh, that's er... interesting! Didn't know you had such an imagination!

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Just like what the white cat said. Only I can see these things...)

Dialogues.Speaker: Lumi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: By the way, you won't believe what happened last night!

Dialogues.Speaker: Lumi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I had a DREAM!

Dialogues.Speaker: Lumi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Can't quite remember the details... but it felt sweet!

Dialogues.Speaker: Lumi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: My coworkers said they had a similar dream... Maybe I managed to tell them how much I care about them in that dream.

Options.PlotLineKey: I'm sure you did. You're a natural leader.
Yeah, and you'll be a boss someday for sure.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lumi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Haha, because I'm Lumi, Luminary of Logistics!

Dialogues.Speaker: Lumi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Shhh, gotta keep it low-key... Can't let my boss hear this, or I'll be in trouble.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lumi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh no, just got a rush order... Let me give you the payment first.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lumi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Again, thanks a bunch for your help! If you ever swing by my hometown, Yuezhou, I'll treat you to some local delicacies!

Dialogues.Speaker: Lumi's Terminal
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We promise, we deliver! We promise, we deliver!

Dialogues.Speaker: Lumi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Got it, got it! Sorry, gotta dash! Catch you later!

Dialogues.Speaker: Lumi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Bye, {PlayerName}!

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: After bowing deeply, Lumi grabs a delivery crate and rushes out of the station.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey:
After Tianhu and his subordinates depart, Lumi expresses her heartfelt gratitude. You ask if she remembers what happened in the Somnoire, and as expected, she has forgotten everything upon waking...

Now, you are the only person in Solaris who still remembers this adventure.
